pageContext.claim: “That's the other thing. If you use your rights, you use your power, if you use Article II, it's called obstruction, but only for Trump, for nobody else.”
pageContext.analysis: Obstruction of justice charges were part of the impeachment resolutions against Bill Clinton and Richard Nixon. Trump has not been formally accused by anyone of obstructing justice, though some Democratic lawmakers believe he did so. Potential obstruction also appears to be a line of inquiry for special counsel Robert Mueller, according to news reports.
